UPGRADE.title: Confirm plan upgrade
UPGRADE.description: You’re switching to a higher plan. Your subscription will be updated immediately, and you’ll unlock more storage right away.
UPGRADE.info: Since you’re upgrading mid-cycle, we’ll only charge you the difference for the rest of your current billing period.

DOWNGRADE.title: Confirm plan downgrade
DOWNGRADE.description: You’re moving to a lower plan. Your subscription will be adjusted immediately.
DOWNGRADE.info: Because you’re downgrading mid-cycle, the unused amount from your current plan will be credited toward your new plan.

PERIOD_CHANGE.title: Confirm billing period change
PERIOD_CHANGE.description: You’re changing how often you’re billed. Your subscription will be updated right away with the new billing period.
PERIOD_CHANGE.info: Because you’re switching the billing period mid-cycle, the unused amount from your current plan will be credited toward your new plan.
